typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		SearchName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		OtherLanguages as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ODSPeople
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		CustomerName as string,
		BillToCustomer as string,
		PrimaryContactPerson as string,
		PostalCityID as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentFlag as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sinkCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		CustomerName as string,
		BillToCustomerID as integer,
		CustomerCategoryID as integer,
		BuyingGroupID as integer,
		PrimaryContactPersonID as integer,
		AlternateContactPersonID as integer,
		DeliveryMethodID as integer,
		DeliveryCityID as integer,
		PostalCityID as integer,
		CreditLimit as decimal(18,2),
		AccountOpenedDate as date,
		StandardDiscountPercentage as decimal(18,3),
		IsStatementSent as boolean,
		IsOnCreditHold as boolean,
		PaymentDays as integer,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		DeliveryRun as string,
		RunPosition as string,
		WebsiteURL as string,
		DeliveryAddressLine1 as string,
		DeliveryAddressLine2 as string,
		DeliveryPostalCode as string,
		DeliveryLocation as binary,
		PostalAddressLine1 as string,
		PostalAddressLine2 as string,
		PostalPostalCode as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ODSCustomers
ODSPeople select(mapColumn(
		SQL_PersonID = PersonID,
		FullName,
		PreferredName,
		SearchName,
		IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress,
		Photo,
		CustomFields,
		OtherLanguages,
		LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select4, Select5 lookup(CityID == SQL_CityID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(SQL_PersonID)) ~> ExistingRows
ExistingRows select(mapColumn(
		SQL_CityKey,
		SQL_CityID,
		CityName = Select2@CityName,
		Location = Select2@Location,
		LatestRecordedPopulation = Select2@LatestRecordedPopulation,
		LastEditedBy = Select1@LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = Select1@ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = Select1@ValidTo,
		CurrentFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectk
Selectk derive(CurrentFlag = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
sinkCustomer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerKey,
		CustomerID,
		CustomerName,
		BillToCustomer,
		PrimaryContactPerson,
		PostalCityID,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		CurrentFlag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
ODSCustomers select(mapColumn(
		CityID,
		CityName,
		StateProvinceID,
		Location,
		LatestRecordedPopulation,
		LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, Select2 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		CityID,
		CityName,
		StateProvinceID,
		Location,
		LatestRecordedPopulation,
		LastEditedBy = Select1@LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = Select1@ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = Select1@ValidTo,
		SQL_PersonID,
		FullName,
		PreferredName,
		SearchName,
		IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress,
		Photo,
		CustomFields,
		OtherLanguages,
		LastEditedBy = Select2@LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = Select2@ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = Select2@ValidTo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3, Select2 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		CityID,
		CityName,
		StateProvinceID,
		Location,
		LatestRecordedPopulation,
		LastEditedBy = Select3@LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = Select3@ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = Select3@ValidTo,
		SQL_PersonID = Select3@SQL_PersonID,
		FullName = Select3@FullName,
		PreferredName = Select3@PreferredName,
		SearchName = Select3@SearchName,
		IsPermittedToLogon = Select3@IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName = Select3@LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider = Select3@IsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword = Select3@HashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser = Select3@IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee = Select3@IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson = Select3@IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences = Select3@UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber = Select3@PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber = Select3@FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress = Select3@EmailAddress,
		Photo = Select3@Photo,
		CustomFields = Select3@CustomFields,
		OtherLanguages = Select3@OtherLanguages,
		SQL_PersonID = Select2@SQL_PersonID,
		FullName = Select2@FullName,
		PreferredName = Select2@PreferredName,
		SearchName = Select2@SearchName,
		IsPermittedToLogon = Select2@IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName = Select2@LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider = Select2@IsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword = Select2@HashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser = Select2@IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee = Select2@IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson = Select2@IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences = Select2@UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber = Select2@PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber = Select2@FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress = Select2@EmailAddress,
		Photo = Select2@Photo,
		CustomFields = Select2@CustomFields,
		OtherLanguages = Select2@OtherLanguages,
		LastEditedBy = Select2@LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = Select2@ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = Select2@ValidTo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 derive(isActive = 1) ~> AddingisActive
 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CityKey as integer,
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Location as binary,
		LatestRecordedPopulation as long,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentFlag as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CityID,
		CityName,
		Location,
		LatestRecordedPopulation,
		LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		CurrentFlag = isActive
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CityKey as integer,
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Location as binary,
		LatestRecordedPopulation as long,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentFlag as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['CityID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CityKey = SQL_CityKey,
		CityID = SQL_CityID,
		CityName,
		Location,
		LatestRecordedPopulation,
		LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		CurrentFlag
	)) ~> sink2
AddingisActive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		CustomerName as string,
		BillToCustomer as string,
		PrimaryContactPerson as string,
		PostalCityID as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentFlag as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo
	)) ~> sink3
